text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: …… Apologies, I meant donburi. The type? Pickled. Ingredient? Salmon.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
—— Eyes met. A discounted pack, 
salmon, three cuts…… in the fresh 
seafood corner.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
I borrowed a recipe book from Rob Roy.
There was nothing wrong with the taste.
I would like your assistance in not
letting the result be "discounted".
